title: FAQ
content:
Q1. Is it really free to use the site?

A1. Yes, all tools are completely free to use. There are no additional charges or hidden costs.

Q2. Do I need to install any apps?

A2. No, all tools run directly in your web browser. No software download or installation is required.

Q3. Do I need to provide any personal information?

A3. Most tools can be used anonymously. Some input data is saved in your browser, but it is not sent externally. Please check the privacy policy for details.
